title: Miniature Portrait of Andrew Robertson (1762-1806)
provenance_text:
Andrew Robertson [-1805], Savannah, GA; by descent to Sarah Boone Robertson [-1867?], his grand-niece and god-daughter, after 1805; Alice Smith, Charleston, SC, by 1908 [1]; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, 1908; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] Documentation on the DuPuy gift says "purchased from Sarah Boone Robertson through Alice Smith of Charleston, SC." It is unclear if Alice Smith was acting on behalf of DuPuy or Sarah Boone Robertson to make this transaction happen. Alice Smith could have also have been acting as an executrix for Robertson.
